pr_title: IGNITE-12067 User SQL query execution metrics

timeline.message: IGNITE-12067 Metrics of execution of user SQL queries
IGNITE-12067 Update metric description a little bit

timeline.author: AMashenkov

timeline.bodyText:
Failure callback.
@param failReason Exception caused a failure.
timeline.author: AMashenkov

timeline.bodyText:
Failure callback.
@param failReason Exception caused a failure.
timeline.author: AMashenkov

timeline.bodyText:
I'm just curious.
Why LongAdderMetric is used for succeeded queries and AtomicLongMetric is used for failed\canceled ones?
timeline.author: AMashenkov

timeline.bodyText:
Cancelled queries count metric.
Note: Cancelled query is treated as failed one as well.
timeline.author: AMashenkov

timeline.bodyText: Failed and cancelled queries count metric.
timeline.author: AMashenkov

timeline.bodyText: Next statement makes no sense here "so some memory is reserved."
timeline.author: AMashenkov
